definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: throw down, break or tear down (MI [[הרם]]; ? Ar. harasa, bruise, bray, pound, crush (grain))—

throw down, tear down, c. acc.: altar(s) Ju Jdg 6:25, 1Ki 18:30, 1Ki 19:10, 1Ki 19:14; height ([[גַּב]], where idol-altar stood ? cf. [[גֶּב]] sub [[גבב]]) Ez Eze 16:39; city (cities) Is 14:17, 2Sa 11:25, 2Ki 3:25, 1Ch 20:1 (cf. MI:27) Mal 1:4 (obj. not expr.); wall(s) Ez Eze 13:14, Eze 26:12; house Pr 14:1 (fig. of foolish woman's action); strongholds ([[מִבְחָרִים]]) La 2:2, Mic 5:10; tower(s) Ez Eze 26:4; fig. overthrow (i.e. ruin) land Pr 29:4 (opp. [[יַעֲמִיד]]); obj. men Ex 15:7 (poem in E) Is 22:19 (cast down Shebna from office); fig., opp. building up, of Yahweh's dealings with men Ps 28:5, cf. (without obj.) Je 24:6, Je 42:10; obj. indef. [[אשׁר בָּנִיתִי אֲנִי הׂרֵס]] Je 45:4; abs. Je 1:10, Je 31:28, La 2:17, Job 12:14.
break down, break away [[שִׁנֵּימוֹ בְּפִימוֹ]] ´[[ה]] Ps 58:7 break away their teeth in their mouth! fig., addressed to God.
break through, intr., sq. ´[[אֶל־י]] Ex 19:21; sq. ´[[לַעֲתֽ אֶל־י]], v:Ex 19:24 (both J).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[נֶהֱרָָסָה]] Pr 24:31; 3 pl. [[נֶהֶרְסוּ]] Je 50:15, Joe 1:17; [[וְנֶהֶרְסוּ]] consec. Ez Eze 30:4, Eze 38:20; Impf. [[יֵהָרֵס]] Je 31:40; 3 fs. [[תֵּהָרֵס]] Pr 11:11; [[יֵהָרֵסָוּן]] Ps 11:3; Pt. [[הַנֶּהֱרָסוֹת]] Ez Eze 36:35, Eze 36:36; —be thrown or torn down; wall(s) of vineyard Pr 24:31, of city Je 50:15; cities Ez Eze 36:35 cf. v:Eze 36:36; fig. ruined Pr 11:11 (opp. [[תָּרוּם]]); foundations, [[יְסוֹדׂת]] Ez Eze 30:4; [[שָׁתוֹת]] Ps 11:3; mountains Ez Eze 38:20; storehouses [[מַמְּגֻרוֹת]] Joe 1:17 [v. ´[[מ]]]; valley E. of Jerus. [[לאׁ־יִנׇּתֵשׁ וְלאׁ־יֵהָרֵס]] Je 31:40 it shall not be plucked up nor thrown down, appar. proverb. expression, implying destruction, removal.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. sf. [[תְּהָֽרְסֵם]] Ex 23:24; Inf. abs. [[הָרֵס]] Ex 23:24; Pt. pl. sf. [[מְהָֽרְסַיִח]] Is 49:17; —overthrow, tear down [[הָרֵס תְּהָֽרְסֵם]] Ex 23:24 thou shalt utterly tear them down (JE; obj. = idols cf. Di); pt. destroyers, of Zion Is 49:17 (‖[[מַחֲרִיבַיִח]]).
